name: KOALA'S REVENGE
description:
Arcade style spaceshooter with australian vibes. Koalas, bats, albatross, crocodiles and kangaroos. Lot's of fun.

A poor innocent koala is enjoying a nice summer evening, when he comes upon an evil australian mate, who tricks him in a terrible way.

After this horrible fate, the koala takes his anger and pain and turnes it into strength. He unleashes a powerful weapon, combines it with the eucaliptus he ate earlier and uses it to defeat the other animals who bother him.
